1: <pb/><e>Sb'it David jun tic yic 'ix yamchj yuj eb' filisteo 'a chon̈b' Gat. A jun b'it tic tzc'anlb'ej junc mach tzjucb'tzan b'it.</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal 'o'ch cab' a c'ojl 'ayin, yujto 'ay eb' 'anma tzin pechn b'eyc'oc. Junjn c'u tzya'n eb' owl wet'oc, tzin yixtn eb'.</t>
2: <t>'A junjn c'u tzin spechn b'eyc'oc eb' 'ajc'ojl yajch 'ayn cha, caw niwn eb' tzyij chan̈ sb'a ya'n owl wet'oc.</t>
3: <t>A yic 'ay in xiwc'ojlal, caw tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol.</t>
4: <t>Mamin, caw tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol, tzwaln wach' paxti 'a tas aljnac, yuj cha, matz in xiwi. ¿Toc 'ayt wal 'oj in yutc eb' 'anma to chaml b'a yaji?</t>
5: <pb/><t>Smasnil tiempo tzyal eb' ya paxti 'ayin, tznib'n eb' tzin juw 'eli, an̈j chi nan yuj eb'.</t>
6: <t>Tzan 'ajtil tzyam sb'a eb', tzlaj sc'ub'nc 'el sb'a eb' yic tzin smacn eb', tzin stan̈wni eb', ax yec' a janic' tzin smiln eb' snani.</t>
7: <t>¿Tom 'oj stac' s'at eb' 'elc yuj smul cha? Ach in Diosal, 'ij 'ejm eb' 'anma tic yet' yowl a c'ojol.</t>
8: <pb/><t>B'isb'il o'oj jay 'ejm tzin 'elq'ui, ojtac jantc wal tzin 'aj woq'ui. Tz'ib'b'il jun tzo'n̈ tic oj 'a a libro.</t>
9: <t>A eb' 'ajc'ojl yajch 'ayin, 'oj 'at eb' 'eloc yic 'oj in c'annc a colwal. Caw wojc si'mb'il to Dios ach, 'aych 'och wet'oc.</t>
10: <t>Mamin Jehová, in Diosal ach, caw tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol, tzwaln wach' paxti 'a tas aljnac.</t>
11: <t>Tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol, yuj cha, caw matz in xiwi. ¿Toc 'ayt wal 'oj in yutc eb' 'anma'?</t>
12: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, 'oj in yiclc jun tzo'n̈ in ti 'ix wac' 'ayach, atn jun xajmb'al yic tzwaln yuj diosal 'ayach,</t>
13: <t>yujto in a col 'a yol sc'ab' chamel, sec matz in 'em yuj eb' 'ajc'ojol. Axn̈ej 'a a sacq'uinlal tzin 'eq'ui, tza'n in q'uinal yic tzin b'eyc' jacx 'a ojltac.</t>
